name: Recall (itch) (CheckersKD)
description:
This is a game that I made solo for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. There were some rough spots throughout development, but I was able to complete the game. 

In this game, you play as a robot who does not have a weapon. He must defeat his adversaries using only the ability to rewind time on their bullets, and kill them with their own ammo.

Every Sprite, sound effect, and the music is all my original work for this game.
